content: --कूटः, --टं ({%a%}) a deadly poison; <ls>Ś. 6.</ls> ({%b%}) the poison churned out of the ocean and drunk by Śiva; अद्यापि नोज्झति हरः किल कालकूटं <ls>Ch. P. 50.</ls>
